title: If my vaccinated dog bit my daughter, is an anti-rabies vaccine needed
author: Christopher James Varvis Internist Edmonton; Alberta
description: I have a pet dog at home and his vaccines are all up to date. Yesterday evening he was playing with my daughter who is 9 years old and he accidentally bit her

The site appears to have welted but there's no blood. 2 Answers [Christopher James Varvis](/Expert/8125726-Christopher-James-Varvis)Internist Edmonton, Alberta NO ! [Dr. Kaveh Sharif](/Expert/8137204-Kaveh-Sharif)Internist Los Angeles, California I doubt rabies, so I do not think she needs vaccination, but there is risk of infection at the site of the wound.
